cleaned_text: Are you having trouble with your skin? Healing Calendula Balm to the rescue! This balm will moisturize and soothe even the driest skin! There are so many "treatments" on the market but once you do your research, you realize they are full of chemicals. Switch to this all-natural version and we promise you'll see a huge difference! Ingredients: Butyrospermum Parkii Oil, Beeswax*, Tochopherol *Certified Organic
